Name: Sunshine No. 2
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: More a sunset but fruity, flavoursome and well-balanced all the same.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Sunshine No. 2 contains 168 calories
